out_data: The disaster project "Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs" is scheduled to begin construction in Spring 2022. The disaster project "Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements" is currently in the design phase, with no specific start date mentioned. The project "Marie Canyon Green Streets" is anticipated to have a final design by March 2022 and will be advertised for construction bids shortly after that date.
